title: Part - Time Customer Service Rockstar
job_overview:
We are looking to hire a part-time customer service rep for our service company based in California. We need someone that speaks and writes English flawlessly. Someone that has experience dealing with customers, Someone that can easily multi-task with many phone calls inbound and outbound every day, emails, chats, text messages, zoom calls etc

This job is Saturday, 7:30 am to 5 pm California time, with a 30 minute lunch break
The job is also on Sunday from 12pm to 5pm California time.
The job is also on Monday from 9am to 3pm California time.
We offer a base pay depending on your experience, plus ongoing bonuses for procuring and retaining clients.

If this is you, please reply with the following:

A. Recent copy of your resume

B. A one to two-minute audio recording introducing yourself
This will help me get an idea of how you sound on the phone and your phone personality.

C. Your Skype ID or Teams ID
If we like your application, we will connect with you immediately on your Skype profile

We want to hire someone that speaks comfortably and confidently.
Thank you in advance and we look forward to talking with you soon.
